TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompositeDesignerTheme extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供 物件的主題設定。

span.span: Provides theme settings to objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 類別控制 物件在工作流程設計介面上的外觀及操作。The class controls the look and feel of a object on a workflow design surface. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立自訂 ，其方式是從 類別衍生，並為新主題設定適當的屬性。The following example shows how to create a custom by deriving from the class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#30)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#30)] 若要使用 上的主題，請將 套用至 類別。To use the theme on a , apply the to the class. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#24)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#24)]

param.span: ，定義 上展開按鈕的界限。

span.span: The that defines the bounds of the expand button on the .

summary.span: 取得定義複合活動設計工具上展開按鈕之背景顯示屬性的筆刷。

span.span: Retrieves a brush that defines the background display properties of the expand button on the composite activity designer.

returns.span: 物件，使用 參數來定義筆刷區域裡，筆刷在展開按鈕中從線形漸層左上角到右下角套用的兩個顏色。

span.span: A object that uses the parameter to define the button area in which the brush applies two colors in a linear gradient from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the expand button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果展開按鈕的背景筆刷在呼叫 `null` 前尚未設為 `Nothing` (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，則此方法將處置先前筆刷並建立新筆刷。If the background brush for the expand button is not set to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) before is called, the method disposes of the previous brush and creates a new one.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

summary.span: 在 建構函式提供的初始化後進行進一步的初始化工作。

span.span: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those provided by the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 屬性設定為 `true`， 方法將從作業系統中取得 物件的設定。If the property is set to `true`, the method obtains settings for the object from the operating system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnAmbientPropertyChanged(valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty ambientProperty) cil managed

param.name: ambientProperty
param.span: 複合設計工具主題現在應使用的 列舉值。

span.span: The enumeration value which the composite designer theme should now use.

summary.span: 通知 物件，設計工具的環境屬性設定已改變。

span.span: Notifies the object that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫此方法時，它將設定 和 屬性為 。When this method is called it sets the and properties to . 列舉會決定設計工具主題取得其環境屬性設定的位置。The enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings. 如果已設定 值，設計工具主題類別將從 屬性取得其環境設定。If the value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the property. 如果已設定 值，設計工具主題類別將從設計工具安裝的作業系統取得其環境設定。If the value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.

summary.span: 取得複合活動設計工具上的浮水印影像。

span.span: Gets the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.

value.span: 用來做為 浮水印的 物件。

span.span: The object to use as the watermark for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 屬性值為 `null` (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)，此屬性將提供浮水印的影像。If the property value is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) this property will provide the image for the watermark. 如果 屬性設定為有效值，此屬性將設為 `null` (`Nothing`)。If the property is set to a valid value, this property is set to `null` (`Nothing`).
